title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4210.3 - Transmission equipment to be reported
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4210.3 - Transmission equipment to be reported

State Regulations

Each licensed quarter horse track shall, upon request
from the commission, furnish the commission with a written description or
blueprint, as requested by the commission, showing the location of all
equipment used or permitted to be used for the transmission of information
within, to or from its premises, together with all telephone, teletype and
telegraph or other electrical wires and radio and television equipment upon or
entering its premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4210.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
